entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 6.
